name: shuts Wave
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
SWAVE is a strategy backed token following allocations of shüts Crypto strategy. The objective of this strategy is to deliver long-term capital growth while being 100% invested in the cryptocurrency asset class. The strategy is designed to keep the investor invested in winning crypto trends, and to offload losing crypto assets, therefore enhancing risk/return measure. 

This is a derivative token, created to work similar to a mutal fund/etf. The underlying assets derive the value and growth of the token.
